title: Add Command
objective: Learn how to define commands using Electronic Data Sheets, how to define a command handler function, and register it with the command dispatcher.

exercise.instructions:
1. Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Command Payloads' comment block.
2. Create a new 'ContainerDataType':
    Named 'SetParam_CmdPayload'
    EntryList entry named 'Param' with type 'BASE_TYPES/uint16'

Note BASE_TYPES is defined in cfe/modules/core_api/eds/base_types.xml

1. Locate the 'DataTypeSet: Command Packets' comment block.
2. Create a new 'ContainerDataType':
    Named 'SetParam'
    FunctionCode value of '${APP_C_FW/APP_BASE_CC} + 0'
    EntryList entry named 'Payload' with type 'SetParam_Payload'

Note APP_C_FW/APP_BASE_CC defines the starting command code for applications.
Note the GUI needs to be restarted after building the new lesson cFS target.

1. Locate the Event Message Id (EID) definitions. At the end of the list add:
    #define @TEMPLATE@_SET_PARAM_EID   (@TEMPLATE@_BASE_EID + 4)

Note @TEMPLATE@_BASE_EID is defined in app_cfg.h

1. After the @TEMPLATE@_ResetAppCmd() function add
    The @TEMPLATE@_SetParamCmd() code from the exercise window
